price: 4. arba pridėk prie jos, ir recituok Koraną ritmingu recitavimu.
arabic: أَوۡ زِدۡ عَلَيۡهِ وَرَتِّلِ ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ تَرۡتِيلًا

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: aw zid ʿalayhi warattili al-qur'āna tartīlan
